definition: quantity of sand (transported by a river)/sediment content
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The results show that the annual average sediment discharge for the Yichang Station is stable.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，宜昌站多年平均輸沙量是較穩定的。

sentences.english: The variation of river sediment load is considerably affected by rainfall and underlying surface.
sentences.chinese: 河流輸沙量的變化受流域降水和下墊面影響很大。
